subject: Haskell Invitational
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Preakness Stakes winner Shackleford is the 5-2 morning-line favorite in a field of eight for Sunday’s $1 million Haskell Invitational at Monmouth Park in Oceanport, N.J.
snippet: The Preakness Stakes winner Shackleford is the 5-2 morning-line favorite in a field of eight for Sunday’s $1 million Haskell Invitational at Monmouth Park in Oceanport, N.J.
